justification: "The AQ is the most well-known questionnaire for measuring autistic traits" (Questionnaires section).
"The SRS-A measures social symptoms of ASD" (Questionnaires section).

measured_by: learning-rate parameter estimated with the Rescorla-Wagner Softmax model in the Probability Tracking Task
justification: "Model A ... included three parameters for learning rate … fitting choices of individual participants with a Rescorla Wagner-Softmax selector system" and learning rate is defined as "the speed with which one learns".

measured_by: meta-learning parameter in the simplified Reinforcement Meta Learner (Model C)
justification: "Model C was a simplified version of the Reinforcement Meta Learner … adaptation process is regulated by a meta-learning parameter, influencing the sensitivity to volatility."
